attributes.action: Reintroduce dog licensing for breeders and owners
attributes.additional_details:
The benefits would include:
- reducing the amount of unsuitable owners bringing unfavoured publicity on certain breeds.
- reducing the amount of dogs being surrendered to shelters or turned loose to fend for themselves
- assisting the police and RSPCA in prosecuting owners of dangerous dogs or owners guilty of animal neglect/cruelty.
attributes.background: This petition is for the reintroduction of annual license laws for dogs, with the aim of having every dog owner holding a license for every dog they currently own, plus new owners having a license in place before a dog is introduced into their home.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions: 

https://moderate.petition.parliament.uk/admin/petitions/643650
Bring back a Dog Licence

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643033
Require anyone who breeds dogs to have a licence
